cases.case_name: Lewis v. Maverick Transportation LLC et al.

cases.defendant_description: Trucking company and DriveCam AI technology provider

cases.case_name: Spilsbury v. Demchok et al.
cases.ai_relevance: Plaintiff alleges defendants exploited her using artificial intelligence, including creating an online gaming account in her name and selling her identity on the dark web using AI-enabled tools.

cases.defendant_description: Individual defendants allegedly exploiting plaintiff

cases.case_name: Risher v. Adecco Inc. et al.
cases.ai_relevance: Dispute centers on unsolicited texts sent by an AI-operated recruiting chatbot named Mya, alleged to violate the TCPA’s restrictions on artificial or prerecorded voice calls.

cases.defendant_description: Corporate job placement and recruiting service providers

cases.case_name: In re Clearview AI, Inc. Consumer Privacy Litigation

cases.defendant_description: Retail corporation alleged Clearview AI customer
